name: Get Http-Only Cookie
description: Get the value of an Http-Only cookie by name. This formula is only intended to be used server-side for SSR/proxied API requests to read Http-Only cookies.

arguments.name: Cookie name
arguments.description: The name of the Http-Only cookie you want to get the value of.

output.description: The value of the cookie. If no cookie is found, this will return Null. If you use this formula client-side, it will return a placeholder template string.
